titleStmt.title: True judgement, or, The spiritual-man judging all things, but he himself judged of no man. To them who are growing up into discerning and judgement: and to them, who cannot endure sound judgement.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black spread-Eagle, at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black spread-Eagle, at the west end of Pauls
